Package com.example.matata

Class AddEventUnitTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.matata.AddEventUnitTest
@Config(sdk=28, manifest="--none") public class AddEventUnitTest extends Object
Runs tests using the Robolectric test framework for Android.

  • Constructor Details

    • AddEventUnitTest

      public AddEventUnitTest()

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      Initializes the AddEvent instance before each test.

    • testGenerateRandomEventID

      public void testGenerateRandomEventID()
      Tests that each generated event ID is unique. Expected outcome: The two generated event IDs should be different.

    • testGenerateHash

      public void testGenerateHash()
      Tests hash generation for a given string input.
      See Also:
      • Expected outcome: The hash should not be null and should have a length of 64 characters.

    • testBmpCompression

      public void testBmpCompression()
      Tests bitmap compression by encoding and decoding a bitmap. Expected outcome: The compressed bitmap should be successfully decoded back to a Bitmap object.

    • testGenerateQRbitmap

      public void testGenerateQRbitmap()
      Tests the QR code bitmap generation for a given event ID.
      See Also:
      • Expected outcome: A QR code bitmap should be generated with width and height of 500 pixels.

    • testOnTimeSelected_SetsCorrectTime

      public void testOnTimeSelected_SetsCorrectTime()
      Tests that the correct time is displayed in the eventTime TextView after time selection. Expected outcome: The eventTime TextView should display the time as "10:30".

    • testOnDateSelected_SetsCorrectDate

      public void testOnDateSelected_SetsCorrectDate()
      Tests that the correct date is displayed in the eventDate TextView after date selection. Expected outcome: The eventDate TextView should display the date as "08/12/2024".
